name: Airplane (Invisible Mammal Studios)
description:
This game was 100% made by sully bully. I am not taking any credit I am just publishing it. The following description was done by him to.

Yay! It's finally out! After less than a week of waiting!  Use the mouse to move your airplane around, and click to shoot enemies. Red enemies are the most easy to defeat. Green airplanes shoot their own bullets, and purple ones annihilate you.  If you die, you can go to the shop and buy different items for your airplane!

S TO CHANGE MUSIC

Also, every once in a while, a blue bubble will pop up and scroll down the screen. Collect it. Its a shield, and will block all bullets and airplane from hitting you!

Love and favorite if you liked: What took you five minutes to play took me five days to make!

Code and graphics all by me. Sound from freesound.org.  Music is Pursuit by PaperAirplaneBoy, and Cloud 9 by 7obu Enjoy! My 2nd top love!!! And my 2nd top remix!!!! I can't promise I'll reply to every comment ^.^

https://scratch.mit.edu/users/SullyBully/
